author: chirino
msg: Added assertion to test that system properties can be used to configure broker settings.

author: chirino
msg: Added a <bean class="org.springframework.beans.factory.config.PropertyPlaceholderConfigurer"/> to all activemq configuation files so that system properties can be used in the configuration of the broker.

author: rdonkin
msg: Added stylesheet. Thanks to Stephen Colebourne for the catch.

author: chirino
msg: Added example to show how to use system properties to configure values in xbean.
